results.title: [Peter Greenaway interview for Prospero's Books : The Movie Show]
results.brief_description: Margaret Pomeranz, co-host of ‘The Movie Show’, interviews film-maker Peter Greenaway about his film, ‘Prospero’s Books’. Greenaway discusses the origins of the project, working with acting legend Sir John Gielgud and some of the creative processes behind the film.
results.title_for_label: [Peter Greenaway interview for Prospero’s Books : The Movie Show]
results.description: Margaret Pomeranz, co-host of ‘The Movie Show’, interviews film-maker Peter Greenaway about his film, ‘Prospero’s Books’. Greenaway discusses the origins of the project, working with acting legend Sir John Gielgud and some of the creative processes behind the film.
description_for_label: Margaret Pomeranz, co-host of ‘The Movie Show’, interviews film-maker Peter Greenaway about his film, ‘Prospero’s Books’. Greenaway discusses the origins of the project, working with acting legend Sir John Gielgud and some of the creative processes behind the film.

results.title: [Peppermint superfrog by Man Bites God]
results.creator_credit: Sarah Phillips and Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT
results.brief_description:
Music video using hand-drawn and cut-out animation.
‘Peppermint Superfrog’ performed by Oz band Man Bites God.
Graduate work from an AIM (Centre for Animation and Interactive Media) RMIT graduate, 2006.
